title: Starting My Journey at SAP Globalization
excerpt: Reflecting on my first weeks as a Fullstack Software Development Intern at SAP. From robotics competitions to enterprise software development - here's what I've learned so far.

title: From Robotics Competitions to Cloud-Native Development
